description: The changes are being made to minimise the risk of coronavirus returning to the island.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey test and trace changes before border relaxation
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey test and trace changes before border relaxation - BBC News
maintext: Dr Nicola Brink, director of Public Health, said: "It is important that we test arrivals on day seven, as well as when they first arrive, as this will allow us to identify the vast majority of those who may have contracted Covid-19 before or during their travel to Guernsey.
